question: What are the latest IT trends adopted by companies in the financial services industry?

subtasks.task: Identify all companies operating within the financial services industry and their basic details such as name and active status.
Gather the IT trend data associated with the financial services industry from the IndustryITTrend table to understand what technologies are being adopted.
Link the company data with the IT trends to find out which companies are adopting which specific IT trends identified in the previous step.
Compile and analyze engagement metrics from social media platforms to assess how these companies promote their IT adoption and trends.
Summarize the findings to present an overview of the latest IT trends being adopted specifically by companies in the financial services sector.
